attributes.action: review the situation whereby the banks have got away with charging customers amounts way above administration costs for exceeding their overdrafts.  The tax payer is not to constantly bale out the banks when they have destroyed the economy by their incompetence and the greed of their executives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
